backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing building management system with user profiles, roles (binaSahibi, yetkili, sakin), building creation, invite code system, and access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the building management application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color system, defining design tokens for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the building management ERP application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router setup, authentication provider, protected routes, and conditional layout rendering based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/BuildingCreateFo: Form component for creating new buildings with validation, loading states, error handling, and success callbacks using shadcn/ui components.
Invite code management panel for building owners to create role-based invite codes with copy-to-clipboard functionality and table displaying all created codes with their status.
frontend/src/components/InviteCodeRegist: A form component for registering with a 16-character alphanumeric invite code, with validation, role-based messaging, and mutation handling via useRegisterWithInviteCode hook.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that renders Navigation, an Outlet for nested routes, and a footer with copyright and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile (Sheet) menus, displaying menu items (Dashboard, Home, Announcements, Members, Users, Profile) and logout functionality using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, buildings, and invite codes via the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components (primary, secondary, muted, destructive, sidebar, charts, etc.).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the App component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Announcements.tsx: Displays and manages building announcements with priority levels, allowing authorized users (binaSahibi, yetkili) to create new announcements. Uses mock data and includes role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/BuildingMembers.tsx: Shows a list of building members with their roles and statistics (total members, building owners, authorities). Currently displays mock data with the current user as the only member.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying user status, login information, and principal ID. Shows a welcome message and highlights first-time login status.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page that handles onboarding flows for different user types (building owner, authority, resident) and displays building information for existing users. Manages building creation and invite code registration.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with three user type options (building owner, authority, resident) that stores the selected onboarding flow before Internet Identity authentication. Features card-based UI for each user type.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page component displaying user information including Principal ID, authentication method (Internet Identity), session date, account status, and user role with Turkish localization.
frontend/src/pages/UserDetail.tsx: Empty file placeholder for user detail page component.
frontend/src/pages/Users.tsx: Users list page component with placeholder implementation showing a development notice that the feature will be activated once backend getAllUserProfiles endpoint is completed.
frontend/src/utils/roleTranslations.ts: Utility functions for translating Role enum values to Turkish display names (Bina Sahibi, Yetkili, Sakin) and mapping them to badge variants for UI rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter font family, custom animations, and design tokens for a dark mode-enabled component library.
project_state.json: Project state document defining a multi-tenant building management ERP system with Internet Identity authentication, role-based authorization, phased development strategy, and Turkish localization requirements.
